column1: I am eternally grateful for my loyal volunteers who joined us to learn how to gather signatures to get me on the ballot.  I couldn't be in this fight without you. https://t.co/mPjhGgsman
Please join me for my Mt Vernon town hall on Thu Jan 23: https://t.co/bQnXxyIxsC
I am proud to team up with my friend and colleague Rep.  @AnthonyBrownMD4 to endorse @PeteButtigieg: https://t.co/jBYQwAdSzE
My op-ed in the Washington Post lays out how we can get more fair representation in Virginia: https://t.co/Kh85RdluLY
Fun spending the evening with @mccoyforiowa and other @PeteButtigieg Iowa kitchen cabinet members.  Happy New Year! 🎉 https://t.co/oUCpAwE56o
@modernangelo @mattcorridoni @PeteButtigieg Dress warm!
Speaking with @AsianLatinoIowa leaders about @PeteButtigieg's vision for the country. https://t.co/DCV77fnkLR
The Des Moines cold won't keep me from knocking more for @PeteButtigieg. ❄👟 https://t.co/jBRvSAlKMk

Hearing from Abi Arshi Hannah and Michael -- @WaukeeHS students -- about gun violence prevention public health the Iowa caucuses @PeteButtigieg and other issues important to young people. https://t.co/mNr2j14yMC

Extremely important conversation with @NAMIIowa about suicide prevention opioid addiction treatment programs and @PeteButtigieg's mental health plan. @NAMICommunicate is saving lives. https://t.co/G5BK8D9dnc
Grateful for your hard work.  You're making Northern Virginia proud. https://t.co/8HfXn5H7zj
Talking strategy with @bmcfife1 a leading @PeteButtigieg campaign staffer about organizing Iowans to caucus for Mayor Pete. https://t.co/c8X8SmXDq7
More door knocking for @PeteButtigieg in Des Moines.  This is how we win. 👟🚪🇺🇸 https://t.co/dluiXjwPVr
What fun to introduce @PeteButtigieg at his town hall in Marshalltown Iowa.  We must defeat Donald Trump in 2020. https://t.co/5DDJaNAlx5
What's the most effective way to win votes?  Meet people at their doors -- even all the way in Iowa.  I love talking with folks about voting for @PeteButtigieg. https://t.co/pqexyYIDbB
Thrilled to be with volunteers in Des Moines Iowa helping @PeteButtigieg. https://t.co/LuvhxX4FgW
I am honored to receive the endorsement of @PPFA.  I am proud to fight to expand health care access and to protect a woman's right to choose. https://t.co/Uf4PIsjO1j
@PatHedger18 @unsuckdcmetro Check our government Twitter -- @repdonbeyer -- where Rep. Beyer does call attention to WMATA.  This here is a political account.
For the future of our democracy President Trump must be impeached.  I will vote for both articles of impeachment against him. https://t.co/VdFRQbBEDg
Today I am proud to stand with @AdamEbbin @MikeSigner @MarkKeam @AndriaMcClellan and @GlennNye to file to get @PeteButtigieg on the Virginia ballot. https://t.co/2HrQKKJEoY
WATCH: I have introduced a bill for a wealth tax of 10% on those making at least $1 million.  It is a step in overcoming income inequality.   https://t.co/l7NrvxSidB
I am filled with joy because in January for the first time in decades Democrats in Virginia will control the state House the state Senate and the governorship.  Congratulations @vademocrats!!!
Check out these photos of GOTV weekend (the final days before Virginia votes tomorrow): https://t.co/wKvxNEpyX0
Great turnout at the Mt Vernon / Lee headquarters for a day of canvassing. 👟 https://t.co/DLunoxkVJs

Fun kicking off a Providence area canvass with @DaliaPalchik @marcussimon @DickSaslaw @McKay4Chairman @KarlFrisch and many others yesterday.  Canvassers are the lifeblood of our Democratic party.  Thank you for all you do! https://t.co/MAphRFTaIf

Proud to my core to team up with these fabulous women -- @ElaineLuriaVA @SpanbergerVA07  and @JenniferWexton -- to effect positive change in the US House and in our spare time work to elect Dems to the Virginia General Assembly.  https://t.co/nvW9V4fqCV

Join me in Fairfax tomorrow to canvass for Dems:  10am-12pm Providence District -- Falls Church (incl @DaliaPalchik) Sign up: https://t.co/U3fKOJ0Zoz  12pm-3pm Mt Vernon/ Lee Districts -- Alexandria Sign up: https://t.co/VgOqBnnwMg
Congratulations to the @Nationals World Series champions for the first time!!! 🏆🥇 ⚾

Gov. Gerry Baliles was an exceptional governor who translated his thoughtful reflection into powerful public policy.  His is the landmark transportation investment and reformation of the 20th century.  His death is a real loss for Virginians and all Americans.  I will miss him.

Lead contamination in water in schools is a critical issue as there is no safe level of lead exposure for children. I am working with Rep. @MikieSherrill and Rep. @JenniferWexton to push for more federal infrastructure to combat this nationwide problem. https://t.co/6xHgzbHv7Q
Those are some great sneaks for canvassing. 👟 https://t.co/cvalfIWMoK
This inning though. ⚾ #WorldSeries. Go @Nationals!

Democrats are working to impeach Pres. Trump because he is jeopardizing our national security by working with foreign governments to undermine our elections.  This weekend I addressed the @arlingtondems impeachment rally: https://t.co/EqEDHOgoOe
I'm thrilled to host my annual Women's Conference this Saturday in Arlington and excited to welcome @JaneFonda to my district: https://t.co/L3fan1sNNc
I don't agree with Rep. Greg Gianforte on much but we both care deeply about preventing suicide: https://t.co/YxorZudnHE
I think my friend @PeteButtigieg may bee the most calm candidate I've ever seen. 🐝 https://t.co/nvh9jTsYt6

Serving the people of Virginia's 8th congressional district is one of the honors of my life and it was a joy  speaking tonight at our annual Kennedy King Dinner.  Thank you for your unwavering support!  I can't do this without you. https://t.co/t1DQxXdVD6
Canvassing is how we win! 👟🚪🇺🇸 https://t.co/GdUh5soN5z

In May I called for an impeachment inquiry.  Now I am calling for articles of impeachment against Pres. Donald Trump.  This move would legally initiate the impeachment process. https://t.co/GPmHIB0amV
I am proud of my colleagues especially Virginia Reps. @SpanbergerVA07 and @ElaineLuriaVA for their courage. https://t.co/1Q3BAKgtef
I am working to protect endangered species both from extinction and from Pres. Trump: https://t.co/Lqad8rAadl
I am extraordinarily proud to work with @TeamPelosi and @TheDemocrats to improve the lives of the American people. https://t.co/Z8OM810ggE
Proud to represent Virginia with @JenniferWexton in the @PressClubDC spelling bee. 🐝 https://t.co/YpHRX5wWBH
Ready. 💪 #NPCBee https://t.co/LGVYBqlhAk
Buzzing with excitement to compete tonight in the @PressClubDC's annual spelling bee.  🐝  Hope you can join me: https://t.co/JPsvtAbePj
A touching moment last night honoring Pam Henriksen volunteer for @arlingtondems since the 60s! https://t.co/HRw0vKpksT
I was on @MSNBC with @halliejackson this morning to discuss how Democrats in the House are working to prevent gun violence: https://t.co/U1CkLzL13V
A little rain didn't put a damper on the fun at Del. @marcussimon's celebration. ☔ https://t.co/njn80Z8OAW
Does chili taste great even when it's hot out?  It does when you're at the @arlingtondems Labor Day chili cookoff. 🍲🌶 https://t.co/II01LiwQuA
Ice cream Labor Day celebration with Falls Church Dems is an event I always look forward to. 🍦 https://t.co/cDjQAkaPhY
OfIf we elect a Democratic president in 2020 we will revolutionize our labor laws to prioritize workers.  Fun celebrating Labor Day with @AlexVADems. https://t.co/Pi05ZZ7YTB
One of my favorite weekends of the year!  Nice afternoon celebrating with @Virginia_AFLCIO. https://t.co/AExg3SjhkT
@kcristol He is beautiful.
🍲🌶🇺🇸🌞 See you Monday https://t.co/YxHstT6Q2i
Honored to celebrate Women’s Equality Day at the Virginia NOW PAC campaign kickoff https://t.co/KD67mEFF5w
Please join me on Thursday September 5 at 7pm for a town hall in Belle Haven/ Hybla Valley: https://t.co/GfZnD5Lyhm
I look forward to coming back from August recess and rolling up my sleeves to take bold action in the House on gun violence prevention: https://t.co/pdYeIZ9Ejo
I had a blast this weekend hanging with my friends at the @arlingtondems and others at the @arlingtoncofair. https://t.co/UUJqX3766A
We need leaders like @PeteButtigieg who has seen the challenges rural America faces.  His new plan will unlock the potential of rural communities across the country.  https://t.co/hasiseZmi9
I hope you will join the @arlingtondems this Saturday August 10 to hear from my new chief of staff Tanya Bradsher: https://t.co/ZLmLFlpdb7
Thank you @PeteButtigieg. https://t.co/hdVQiZj6XT
I am working to expand the use of body cameras by federal police: https://t.co/GX8fc0s6zG

My colleagues on the House Science Committee and I are pushing for federal agencies to make policies that protect scientists.  I am grateful to @UCSUSA for leading on this issue: https://t.co/KhPXAZV8iB
It was a real treat to be welcomed by the @lgbtdemsofva in Alexandria.  I am proud to fight in the House of Representatives for equality for all people. https://t.co/LFtY8tfLG9
Pres. Trump is a virulent dangerous racist.  We must dedicate ourselves to defeating him in November 2020: https://t.co/rhPZeyLcUc
I am proud of my bill the Fair Representation Act which would allow every vote to matter and everyone to win their fair share of seats: https://t.co/Hd4GiAsTFD
My healthcare bill which focuses on maternal mortality mental health and substance abuse will help to address some of the country’s most pressing public health crises: https://t.co/hpFN0KAJqr
I am proud to introduce the No Hate Act which would improve hate crimes reporting and expand assistance and resources for victims of hate crimes: https://t.co/9rhYVbYOYx

Artificial intelligence brings exciting potential but also concerning privacy risks.  My amendment would bring more research and better standards of use for this new technology. https://t.co/8ahqsvXYHv
Our relationship with the entire world needs to change.  It's time to pass the torch to a new generation and that is @PeteButtigieg.  #DemDebate  #TeamPete
Thrilled to hear @PeteButtigieg say we must rejoin the Paris Climate Agreement!  Pete knows we need an aggressive plan to combat the climate crisis with rural America and local communities. #TeamPete

I appreciate @PeteButtigieg's frank words on the systemic racism in policing.  Under a Buttigieg presidency this country will work toward bringing down the "wall of mistrust" between the African American community and the police. #TeamPete

Thank you @PeteButtigieg for displaying leadership by calling out China: "China is using technology for the perfection of dictatorship.  We must invest in our own domestic competitiveness."  I agree that we must demonstrate that we care about democratic values at home and abroad.

[A Republican Party that suggests] that God would smile at the division of families -- that God would condone putting children in cages -- has lost all claim to using religious language again. -- @PeteButtigieg
Thank you @PeteButtigieg for your thoughtful vision on the future of healthcare.  Americans should have the freedom to do what is medically right and not live in financial fear. #DemDebate
I feel like "Congressman Don" doesn't have quite the same ring to it.  Go get em @PeteButtigieg! https://t.co/ugRNqwf9TS
I am introducing bipartisan bicameral legislation to protect affordable housing: https://t.co/zHS4C4huJ8
I was proud to vote for this landmark immigration legislation to embrace Dreamers: https://t.co/76xnueMFM5
I will soon introduce legislation to require federal uniformed officers to wear body cameras: https://t.co/53Mgo6FJoH
It was fun and inspiring to welcome @PeteButtigieg to my hometown of Alexandria. https://t.co/lZzvYPdJB9
A treat to hear from Mayor @PeteButtigieg at @DemBizNoVA today.  He will make a superb president. https://t.co/aiV2RPQ1Jp
Welcome to Team @PeteButtigieg @AdamEbbin @MarkKeam and @AndriaMcClellan! https://t.co/dxpYhllIp0
Listen to state Sen. @adamebbin on @maddow speaking about his unwavering push for gun safety legislation in Virginia:  https://t.co/XA18a8gIEa
Proud to call @SpanbergerVA07 my colleague: https://t.co/hnymvyxYk4
Fun celebration with Democratic Asian Americans of Virginia (@daav9). https://t.co/eOu1L3TDMo
I am calling for the House of Representatives to open an impeachment inquiry into the conduct of President Trump. https://t.co/wu2hlqyYyi

I was proud to vote for a bill in the US House to ban discrimination based on sex sexual orientation and gender identity in education employment housing credit and the jury system. https://t.co/zzrfOgp5fO
Proud to have my young constituent's painting hanging in the US Capitol for the next year: https://t.co/5h1i55xKdv
My bill to protect people with pre-existing medical conditions passed the House.  I will not let these Americans be victims of this president. https://t.co/cgoxoemZiC
Please welcome @TanyaBradsher08 my new chief of staff! https://t.co/RVDZYiqEOW
I am working with my US House colleagues in the Washington region to drastically increase funding for Metro: https://t.co/BsDwy3pbLc
I am working with my colleagues in the state legislature to implement measures to make GW Parkway safer: https://t.co/jId4cjr1lD
I can't say it enough: @PeteButtigieg for president. https://t.co/y4nZhfuoXP
Perfect evening celebrating our work with @RobinLynneKelly and @bradybuzz on gun violence prevention legislation. https://t.co/BlDhvafPoF
Thank you @LeeDems for a festive opening day event. ⚾ 🇺🇸 https://t.co/pH1q81ZUyM

I endorsed Barack Obama early having been moved by his intelligence and his political capability.  I am similarly inspired by Mayor Pete.  With him I feel the promise of a new generation and I see a way out of the darkness.  I am proud to endorse @PeteButtigieg for president. https://t.co/1lI1KfG6N0
Listen to my chat with @fox5dc podcast: https://t.co/8LCNmuvHhD
Thank you @TerryMcAuliffe https://t.co/l7u2kFNwlu
I am fighting Pres. Trump's funding cuts to NASA. https://t.co/1iJWkjP0E8

My colleagues and I are pushing for an increase in funding for Energy Department research programs that would be gutted under the president’s 2020 budget proposal.  The research initiatives focus on advancing clean energy technology. https://t.co/n4nkb6Syjf
I am working with the Greater Washington congressional delegation to prohibit the reorganization of the Office of Personnel Management and to find details about it. https://t.co/oF4WIabglT

Federal law is clear: The House Ways & Means Committee on which I serve has the legal authority to request and receive Pres. Trump's tax returns.  The administration has no legal basis to refuse to comply. https://t.co/jE0SQk1ejl

We could fix gerrymandering and our unfair electoral system if Congress passed my bill.  Every vote would matter.  It calls for  - ranked choice voting to elect House members and - larger districts of 3-5 representatives  https://t.co/48qo26XNOo

Today I introduced legislation to tackle climate change + boost the economy. It would:   - cap carbon pollution - curtail carbon dioxide emissions over 20 years - fine companies that violate the pollution regs - give to the public the money from the fines  https://t.co/cbuOwDHO9q
.@tedlieu and I are calling for a criminal investigation into Jared Kushner's security clearance: https://t.co/h7CAkej4pC
Democrats in Congress are determined to push for legislation to protect our health safety and environment: https://t.co/TWRfDDSps6

I am working with my colleague @BobbyScott4VA3 to make the use of seclusion in public schools completely illegal and limit the use of restraints. We also want to tighten oversight and reporting of the use of seclusion and restraint. https://t.co/Px34TLkp1x
I pledge not to serve as a panelist at a public conference when there are no women on the panel.  I am pushing my male colleagues to take the same @GenderAvenger pledge. https://t.co/a2QxNcw0jd
The IRS needs additional funding to track down tax evaders: https://t.co/L2MhvzE50h
Join me Tue Mar 26 for my town hall in Franconia: https://t.co/TuWRXKV7JO
My bill would ban seismic airgun blasting in the Atlantic Ocean.  This ban would protect marine life and coastal economies: https://t.co/pbWVuPC2qC
I am pressuring the FAA to change airplane flight paths south of Reagan National to reduce airplane noise in Northern Virginia. https://t.co/eMSxTt9YXz
What I learned in Central America: https://t.co/9grwTST2eL

We on the House Ways & Means Committee are building the most bullet-proof legal case for why the public should be able to see Pres. Trump's tax returns. Check out my appearance on @AlexWitt. https://t.co/LuNVHdVKpS
Festive evening with @MountVernonDems celebrating mardi gras with superb candidates for county office. https://t.co/VDTKoKRAUm

My bipartisan bill the Extreme Risk Protection Order Act helps family members and law enforcement officials to legally stop someone who is an immediate threat to themselves or others from purchasing or possessing a gun. https://t.co/X6xfk3ReS8
Trump's proposed tariffs which I am against would drastically increase the consumer cost of cars. https://t.co/Eh7tiXqf4H
On this first anniversary of the murders at Parkland I am proud to introduce bipartisan legislation to reduce gun violence: https://t.co/zBxG3AVQVY
I am sponsoring bipartisan legislation which will provide time off from work for families grieving the loss of a child: https://t.co/YrSpsQ6NQP
I enjoyed bringing as my guest Everett Kelley who leads the American Federation of Government Employees to the State of the Union address. https://t.co/dRbNynZUws
Pres. Trump talks about the need for paid family leave but then does not lift a finger to help enact it.  He is all talk. https://t.co/DImksyPtX9
Thank you to @MikeBloomberg at @DemBizNoVA event for saying the congressional Republicans are complicit in each of Trump's dangerous policies. https://t.co/ErZWZCqZ7O
Proud to sponsor the Freedom of Religion Act which would bar a religious test for entering the US. https://t.co/n5zZVXTKLv
